sen.j: 猪熊通 （いのくまどおり）は、京都府京都市内の南北の通りの一つ。
sen.e: Inokuma-dori Street is one of the south and north streets in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Inokuma-dori Street is a street running south-north in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.
Inokuma-dori Street is a street running south-north in Kyoto City, Kyoto Prefecture.

sen.j: 平安京の猪隈小路にあたる。
sen.e: It used to be Inokumakoji in Heiankyo.
It used to correspond to the Inokumakoji in Heiankyo.
It used to correspond to the Inokumakoji in Heiankyo.

sen.j: 堀川通の西方で大宮通の東に位置し、北区_(京都市)の御薗橋西詰（御薗橋通と堀川通の交差点）から南区_(京都市)の十条通まで通じる。
sen.e: The street is located at east of Omiya dori Street which locates at west of Hiorikawa-dori Street, it runs from Misonobashi Nishizume (the crossing between Misonobashi-dori Street and Horikawa-dori Street) in Kita-Ward (Kyoto City) to Jujo-dori Street in Minami-Ward (Kyoto City).

The street is located east of Omiya dori Street which is located west of Hiorikawa-dori Street, running from Misonobashi Nishizume (the crossing between Misonobashi-dori Street and Horikawa-dori Street) in Kita-Ward (Kyoto City) to Jujo-dori Street in Minami-Ward (Kyoto City).

The street is located east of Omiya-dori Street which is located west of Hiorikawa-dori Street, running from Misono-bashi Bridge Nishizume (the crossing between Misonobashi-dori Street and Horikawa-dori Street) in Kita-Ward (Kyoto City) to Jujo-dori Street in Minami-Ward (Kyoto City).
sen.cmt: 表記を統一するため、Omiya-dori Street, Misono-bashi Bridgeとしました。

sen.j: 南の延長は久世橋通の一筋南まで伸びる。
sen.e: The extension street to south goes to one street south of Kuzebashi-dori Street.
The southern extension goes one street south of Kuzebashi-dori Street.
The southern extension goes one street south of Kuzebashi-dori Street.

sen.j: 途中鞍馬口通から寺之内通、今出川通から元誓願寺通、竹屋町通から押小路通（二条城）、花屋町通から七条通（西本願寺）で中断する。
sen.e: On the way, the street stops from Kuramaguchi-dori Street to Teranouchi-dori Street, from Imadegawa-dori Street to Motoseiganji-dori Street, from Takeyamachi-dori Street to Oshinokoji-dori Street (Nijo Castle), from Hanayahco-dori Street to Shichijo-dori Street (Nishi Hongan-ji Temple).

On the way, the street stops from Kuramaguchi-dori Street to Teranouchi-dori Street, from Imadegawa-dori Street to Motoseiganji-dori Street, from Takeyamachi-dori Street to Oshinokoji-dori Street (Nijo Castle), from Hanayahco-dori Street to Shichijo-dori Street (Nishi Hongan-ji Temple).

On the way, the street stops from Kuramaguchi-dori Street to Teranouchi-dori Street, from Imadegawa-dori Street to Motoseiganji-dori Street, from Takeyamachi-dori Street to Oshinokoji-dori Street (Nijo-jo Castle), from Hanayacho-dori Street to Shichijo-dori Street (Nishi Hongan-ji Temple).
sen.cmt: Nijo-jo Castleとし、Hanayahco-dori Street→Hanayacho-dori Streetに修正

sen.j: ほぼ全長にわたり住宅街の中を通る通行量の少ない通りである。
sen.e: This street mostly runs into residential area which doesn't have much traffic.
This street mostly runs into residential area which doesn't have much traffic.
This street mostly runs into residential area which doesn't have much traffic.
sen.cmt: doesn’tのアポストロフィーを半角に修正
頭文字を大文字に修正
Nijo-jo Castle, Ote-mon Gateとしました。

sen.j: 京都東急ホテル（正面は反対側の堀川通）
